ygData.subject: Re: Re: [EverQuest] Troll SK - Looking for Hunting Grounds
ygData.msgSnippet: I think those places might be a little tough for a 51 to solo in. Probably could hunt in Karnor s caslte a bit. Might still make xp in dreadlands... Possibly
ygData.messageBody:
I think those places might be a little tough for a 51 to solo in. Probably could hunt in Karnor's caslte a bit. Might still make xp in dreadlands... Possibly in Great divide if you hunt near a zoneline for the giants.
I think in echo caverns there is a higher level spot. not sure if it's the underbulks.. the taskmaster.. If you do the taskmaster it might be soloable. Not sure. make sure you leave one skellie alive in the room if you do him though. or else a thought horror spawns.
luv,
-Su

======= At 2005-08-17, 21:46:00 you wrote: =======

>Sol B would be good, or Velks. Karnor's can be good also, or the hopper cave in DSP.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Jennifer Dury
> To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
> Sent: Wednesday, August 17, 2005 7:11 PM
> Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Troll SK - Looking for Hunting Grounds
>
>
> So how about for a level 51 monk? Any place I can realistically solo without dying instantly? Or am I pretty much dependent on a group from here on in?
>
> Thanks!
>
> Athiarna
> Disciple, Bristlebane Server
>
>
>
> Fire on High <scendera@...> wrote:
> Befallen is still good. There's Blackburrow if you don't mind a bit of a run
> from POK, the zone line to Beholder Maze from EK is nice at 12, 13 or so,
> for that matter so is chasing down bugs in NK. The ent of Najena could be
> fun as well, or Kurn's.
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: Scott Monsour <b08sam@...>
> To: <EverQuest@yahoogroups.com>
> Sent: Wednesday, August 17, 2005 11:29 AM
> Subject: [EverQuest] Troll SK - Looking for Hunting Grounds
>
>
> > Hell All
> >
> > New to the group so I thought I would drop in and say hello. I played
> > EQ some time ago, six or seven years and it's changed quite a bit to
> > say the least. I do like the Tutorial, which allowed me to create a
> > character and get him to 10-11th level in no time at all. Now being
> > 12th level, I play a Troll SK, what's a good place to hunt. I group
> > when I can but the servers not always busy. Looking for good xp and
> > coin of course. Figured Befallen or the Lava fields.
> >
> > Thanks to all
